verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, cause <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; Thy <S%H4351>birth<s%> and thy <S%H4138>nativity<s%> is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3669>Canaan<s%>; thy <S%H1>father<s%> was an <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> an <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>. birth: Heb. cutting out, or, habitation

And as for thy <S%H4138>nativity<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> thou wast <S%H3205>born<s%> thy <S%H8270>navel<s%> was not <S%H3772>cut<s%>, neither wast thou <S%H7364>washed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H4935>supple<s%> thee; thou wast not <S%H4414>salted<s%> at <S%H4414>all<s%>, nor <S%H2853>swaddled<s%> at <S%H2853>all<s%>. to supple: or, when I looked upon thee

None <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pitied<s%> thee, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of these unto thee, to have <S%H2550>compassion<s%> upon thee; but thou wast cast <S%H7993>out<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>, to the <S%H1604>lothing<s%> of thy <S%H5315>person<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou wast <S%H3205>born<s%>.

And when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by thee, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> thee <S%H947>polluted<s%> in thine own <S%H1818>blood<s%>, I <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%>, <S%H2421>Live<s%>; yea, I <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%>, <S%H2421>Live<s%>. polluted: or, trodden under foot

I have <S%H5414>caused<s%> thee to <S%H7233>multiply<s%> as the <S%H6780>bud<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and thou hast <S%H7235>increased<s%> and waxen <S%H1431>great<s%>, and thou art <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5716>excellent<s%> <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>: thy <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are <S%H3559>fashioned<s%>, and thine <S%H8181>hair<s%> is <S%H6779>grown<s%>, whereas thou wast <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>. caused: Heb. made thee a million excellent: Heb. ornament of ornaments

Now when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by thee, and <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon thee, behold, thy <S%H6256>time<s%> was the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%>; and I <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over thee, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: yea, I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thee, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, and thou becamest mine.

Then <S%H7364>washed<s%> I thee with <S%H4325>water<s%>; yea, I throughly washed <S%H7857>away<s%> thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> from thee, and I <S%H5480>anointed<s%> thee with <S%H8081>oil<s%>. blood: Heb. bloods

I <S%H3847>clothed<s%> thee also with broidered <S%H7553>work<s%>, and <S%H5274>shod<s%> thee with badgers' <S%H8476>skin<s%>, and I <S%H2280>girded<s%> thee about with fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and I <S%H3680>covered<s%> thee with <S%H4897>silk<s%>.
I <S%H5710>decked<s%> thee also with <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>, and I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> upon thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and a <S%H7242>chain<s%> on thy <S%H1627>neck<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>jewel<s%> on thy <S%H639>forehead<s%>, and <S%H5694>earrings<s%> in thine <S%H241>ears<s%>, and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> upon thine <S%H7218>head<s%>. forehead: Heb. nose

Thus wast thou <S%H5710>decked<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and thy <S%H4403>raiment<s%> was of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> <S%H8336><s%>, and <S%H4897>silk<s%>, and broidered <S%H7553>work<s%>; thou didst <S%H398>eat<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>: and thou wast <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful<s%>, and thou didst <S%H6743>prosper<s%> into a <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>.

And thy <S%H8034>renown<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%>: for it was <S%H3632>perfect<s%> through my <S%H1926>comeliness<s%>, which I had <S%H7760>put<s%> upon thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

But thou didst <S%H982>trust<s%> in thine own <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, and playedst the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> because of thy <S%H8034>renown<s%>, and pouredst <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H8457>fornications<s%> on every one that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>; his it was.

And of thy <S%H899>garments<s%> thou didst <S%H3947>take<s%>, and <S%H6213>deckedst<s%> thy high <S%H1116>places<s%> with divers <S%H2921>colours<s%>, and playedst the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> thereupon: the like things shall not <S%H935>come<s%>, neither shall it be so.

Thou hast also <S%H3947>taken<s%> thy <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of my <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of my <S%H3701>silver<s%>, which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> thee, and <S%H6213>madest<s%> to thyself <S%H6754>images<s%> of <S%H2145>men<s%>, and didst commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> with them, of men: Heb. of a male

And <S%H3947>tookest<s%> thy <S%H7553>broidered<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3680>coveredst<s%> them: and thou hast <S%H5414>set<s%> mine <S%H8081>oil<s%> and mine <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

My <S%H3899>meat<s%> also which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> thee, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, wherewith I <S%H398>fed<s%> thee, thou hast even <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>: and thus it was, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>. a sweet: Heb. a savour of rest

Moreover thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, whom thou hast <S%H3205>borne<s%> unto me, and these hast thou <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto them to be <S%H398>devoured<s%>. Is this of thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> a small <S%H4592>matter<s%>, to be: Heb. to devour
That thou hast <S%H7819>slain<s%> my <S%H1121>children<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to cause them to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire for them?

And in all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> thou hast not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, when thou wast <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>, and wast <S%H947>polluted<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> all thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, <S%H188>(woe<s%>, <S%H188>woe<s%> unto thee! <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>;)
That thou hast also <S%H1129>built<s%> unto thee an eminent <S%H1354>place<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> thee an high <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street<s%>. eminent: or, brothel house

Thou hast <S%H1129>built<s%> thy high <S%H7413>place<s%> at every <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and hast made thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%> to be <S%H8581>abhorred<s%>, and hast <S%H6589>opened<s%> thy <S%H7272>feet<s%> to every one that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>.

Thou hast also committed <S%H2181>fornication<s%> with the <S%H1121>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4714><s%> thy <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>, <S%H1432>great<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and hast <S%H7235>increased<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

Behold, therefore I have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> over thee, and have <S%H1639>diminished<s%> thine <S%H2706>ordinary<s%> food, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> thee unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, which are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of thy <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>. daughters: or, cities

Thou hast played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> also with the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%> <S%H804><s%>, <S%H1115>because<s%> thou wast <S%H7646>unsatiable<s%>; yea, thou hast played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with them, and yet couldest not be <S%H7654>satisfied<s%>.

Thou hast moreover <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H8457>fornication<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> unto <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>; and yet thou wast not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H2063>herewith<s%>.

How <S%H535>weak<s%> is thine <S%H3826>heart<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, seeing thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> all these things, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of an <S%H7986>imperious<s%> <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>;

In that thou <S%H1129>buildest<s%> thine eminent <S%H1354>place<s%> in the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H6213>makest<s%> thine high <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street<s%>; and hast not been as an <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, in that thou <S%H7046>scornest<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%>; In that thou buildest: or, In thy daughters is thine, etc
But as a <S%H802>wife<s%> that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, which <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> instead of her <S%H376>husband<s%>!

They <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to all <S%H2181>whores<s%>: but thou <S%H5414>givest<s%> thy <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to all thy <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and <S%H7809>hirest<s%> them, that they may <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee on every <S%H5439>side<s%> for thy <S%H8457>whoredom<s%>. hirest: Heb. bribest

And the <S%H2016>contrary<s%> is in thee from other <S%H802>women<s%> in thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, whereas none <S%H310>followeth<s%> thee to commit <S%H2181>whoredoms<s%>: and in that thou <S%H5414>givest<s%> a <S%H868>reward<s%>, and no <S%H868>reward<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thee, therefore thou <S%H1961>art<s%> <S%H2016>contrary<s%>.
Wherefore, O <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because thy <S%H5178>filthiness<s%> was poured <S%H8210>out<s%>, and thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%> through thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> with thy <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and with all the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of thy <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, and by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, which thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them;

Behold, therefore I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> all thy <S%H157>lovers<s%>, with whom thou hast taken <S%H6149>pleasure<s%>, and all them that thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%>, with all them that thou hast <S%H8130>hated<s%>; I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> them round <S%H5439>about<s%> against thee, and will <S%H1540>discover<s%> thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> unto them, that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> all thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.

And I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee, as women that break <S%H5003>wedlock<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H1818>blood<s%> in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>. as: Heb. with judgments of

And I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> thee into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall throw <S%H2040>down<s%> thine eminent <S%H1354>place<s%>, and shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> thy high <S%H7413>places<s%>: they shall <S%H6584>strip<s%> thee also of thy <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> thy <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%>, and <S%H3240>leave<s%> thee <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>. thy fair: Heb. instruments of thine ornament

They shall also bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> against thee, and they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> thee with <S%H68>stones<s%>, and thrust thee <S%H1333>through<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> thine <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>: and I will cause thee to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from playing the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and thou also shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> no <S%H868>hire<s%> any more.

So will I make my <S%H2534>fury<s%> toward thee to <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from thee, and I will be <S%H8252>quiet<s%>, and will be no more <S%H3707>angry<s%>.

Because thou hast not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, but hast <S%H7264>fretted<s%> me in all these things; <S%H1887>behold<s%>, therefore I also will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> upon thine <S%H7218>head<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>: and thou shalt not <S%H6213>commit<s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> above all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.
Behold, every one that useth <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> shall use this <S%H4911>proverb<s%> against thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As is the <S%H517>mother<s%>, so is her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

Thou art thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, that <S%H1602>lotheth<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and her <S%H1121>children<s%>; and thou art the <S%H269>sister<s%> of thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>, which <S%H1602>lothed<s%> their <S%H582>husbands<s%> and their <S%H1121>children<s%>: your <S%H517>mother<s%> was an <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and your <S%H1>father<s%> an <S%H567>Amorite<s%>.

And thine <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, she and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at thy left <S%H8040>hand<s%>: and thy <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> at thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, is <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>. thy younger: Heb. lesser than thou

Yet hast thou not <S%H1980>walked<s%> after their <S%H1870>ways<s%>, nor <S%H6213>done<s%> after their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>: but, as if that were a <S%H6985>very<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6962><s%> thing, thou wast <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> more than <S%H2004>they<s%> in all thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>. as if: or, that was lothed as a small thing

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> thy <S%H269>sister<s%> hath not <S%H6213>done<s%>, she nor her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, as thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, thou and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

Behold, this was the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, <S%H1347>pride<s%>, <S%H7653>fulness<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H7962>abundance<s%> of <S%H8252>idleness<s%> was in her and in her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, neither did she <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>.
And they were <S%H1361>haughty<s%>, and <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: therefore I took them <S%H5493>away<s%> as I <S%H7200>saw<s%> good.

Neither hath <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H2398>committed<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>; but thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> more than <S%H2007>they<s%>, and hast <S%H6663>justified<s%> thy <S%H269>sisters<s%> in all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>.

Thou also, which hast <S%H6419>judged<s%> thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>, <S%H5375>bear<s%> thine own <S%H3639>shame<s%> for thy <S%H2403>sins<s%> that thou hast committed more <S%H8581>abominable<s%> than <S%H2004>they<s%>: they are more <S%H6663>righteous<s%> than thou: yea, be thou <S%H954>confounded<s%> also, and <S%H5375>bear<s%> thy <S%H3639>shame<s%>, in that thou hast <S%H6663>justified<s%> thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>.

When I shall bring <S%H7725>again<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity<s%> <S%H7622><s%>, the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> <S%H7622><s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> <S%H7622><s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, then will I bring again the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> <S%H7622><s%> of thy <S%H7622>captives<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them:
That thou mayest <S%H5375>bear<s%> thine own <S%H3639>shame<s%>, and mayest be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> in all that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, in that thou art a <S%H5162>comfort<s%> unto them.

When thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>, <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate<s%>, and <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate<s%>, then thou and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to your former <S%H6927>estate<s%>.
